In a message dated 9/29/05 3:40:14 PM, shields@... writes:


> I'll be wanting to buy one at the conference.Â  Maybe you can get a list of

messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] my book is completed and available
messages.msgSnippet: I ll be wanting to buy one at the conference.  Maybe you can get a list of those interested so you can bring enough? Kristin ... From:
messages.messageBody:
I'll be wanting to buy one at the conference. Maybe you can get a list of
those interested so you can bring enough?
Kristin

-----Original Message-----
From: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
SandraDodd@...
Sent: Thursday, September 29, 2005 2:34 PM
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] my book is completed and available

Finally.
http://sandradodd.com/puddlebook

I'll have some at the Live and Learn conference, but for those not attending

they're available for sale. After I'm home I'll probably buy some to send
from here, partly because I can mail them out more quickly than lulu.com.
But
for now, that's the source. I'll update that page if anything changes
about
it.

It's filled with filler. <g> Photos of my kids, mostly. It turns out
that
the amount of writing that fills one magazine page fills two and a half or
three pages of this book's format. That leaves a page or more lying there
white, so I ended up stuffing it with imagery of one kind and another.

Thanks to all of you who've encouraged me and shared with me over the years,

helping convince me my family wasn't a lucky fluke, that others really COULD

do this too!!

Sandra

I'll have some at the Live and Learn conference, but for those not attending

from here, partly because I can mail them out more quickly than lulu.com. But

It's filled with filler. <g> Photos of my kids, mostly. It turns out that

Thanks to all of you who've encouraged me and shared with me over the years,
